snippet: Deutsche Bank named James Ratigan as a new co-head of mergers and acquisitions for the Americas on Friday, succeeding Bruce Evans in the role, according to an internal memo reviewed by DealBook.
abstract: Deutsche Bank named James Ratigan as a new co-head of mergers and acquisitions for the Americas on Friday, succeeding Bruce Evans in the role, according to an internal memo reviewed by DealBook.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Deutsche Bank Names New Co-Head of M.&A. for the Americas
